ingredients.item: 75g Waitrose Love Life Giant Wholegrain Couscous

instructions.step: Preheat the oven to 200ÂºC, gas mark 6.
Cook the couscous in boiling water for 6-8 minutes until tender, drain.
Meanwhile, fry the chorizo and pine nuts in a small frying pan for 2-3 minutes, stir in the couscous, pesto, Parmigiano Reggiano and half the basil.
Halve the peppers, keeping the stalk intact, deseed and place on a small baking tray. Fill with the couscous mixture and bake for 20 minutes. Sprinkle with the remaining basil and serve with salad.
